author: Special Correspondent
text:
M. Gunasekaran, Sessions Judge, Fast Track Mahila Court, Karur, on Thursday awarded life sentence to three persons for murdering Pithan alias Sakthi (35) of Palambalpuram.

According to the prosecution, a 10-member gang murdered Sakthi with deadly weapons at Palambalpuram main roan in March, 2012, due to the previous enmity between him and Patti alias Kathiravan (28).

Sakthi died on the spot.

The Judge, who found guilty of Kathiravan, Rakki alias Rajesh (32) and Ramadurai (25) Udhayachandran, sentenced them to undergo life imprisonment and imposed fine of Rs.1000 under section 302 of the Indian Penal Code.

Other accused were released on the ground that the charges against them were not proved beyond doubt. Udayan alias Udhayachandran, one of the accused, died a few years ago.
title: Three get life sentence for murder
